channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Guitarist Silas Luke Jones Receives Standing Ovation From ‘AGT’ Judges For ‘Misirlou’ Cover
item.description: 🎸 Silas Luke Jones bringing the house down on 'AGT' with a mesmerizing 'Misirlou' cover! 🔥👏 #RockStarMoment #AGT #GuitarHero

item.title: Ozzy Osbourne’s “Crazy Train” Lands on Billboard Hot 100 for First Time Ever
item.description: 🎸 All aboard! Ozzy Osbourne's "Crazy Train" makes its grand entrance on the Billboard Hot 100 chart! Let's rock 🤘 #OzzyOsbourne #BillboardHot100

item.title: Creed Cover U2’s “Where the Streets Have No Name” in Memphis: Watch
item.description: 🎸 Rock legends collide! Creed takes on U2's iconic track in a Memphis tribute. Check out the epic performance! 🎶 #MusicMashup #RockIcons

item.title: Thundercat announces fall tour dates around III Points Fest
item.description: 🌟 Thundercat is hitting the road! 🚐✨ Catch him at III Points Fest and beyond this fall! 🎶 #ThundercatTourDates #LiveMusicJunkie
